option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
for a multiplexed stream, read the stream number given by stream. A value of 255 will read all streams
hostname or IP address of the system to connect to.
port number to connect to on the system.

synopsis.p: Simple client program for fitacf TCP/IP data streams.

description.p: Simple client program for fitacf TCP/IP data streams.
The program dumps an ASCII representation of the fitacf data stream to standard output.
If the stream from the server is multiplexed then the "-s" option can be used to select the appropriate stream.

example.description: Connect to the host peanut.jhuapl.edu at port 1024 and display the data stream.
Connect to the host peanut.jhuapl.edu at port 1024 and display data stream number 2.
